description: A light, protein-packed salad with plump shrimp, crisp cucumbers, and zesty lemon dressing. Perfect for meal prep or summer entertaining!
ingredients: [{"name": "large cooked shrimp", "units": "lb", "amount": "1"}, {"name": "English cucumbers", "units": null, "amount": "2"}, {"name": "red onion", "units": null, "amount": "½"}, {"name": "fresh dill or parsley", "units": "cup", "amount": "¼"}, {"name": "avocado", "units": null, "amount": "1"}, {"name": "extra-virgin olive oil", "units": "tbsp", "amount": "3"}, {"name": "lemon juice", "units": "tbsp", "amount": "2"}, {"name": "honey or maple syrup", "units": "tsp", "amount": "1"}, {"name": "garlic clove", "units": null, "amount": "1"}, {"name": "salt", "units": "tsp", "amount": "½"}, {"name": "black pepper", "units": "tsp", "amount": "¼"}]
instructions: If using raw shrimp, sauté in 1 tbsp olive oil for 2-3 minutes per side. Let cool. In a large bowl, toss cucumbers, red onion, and dill. Whisk olive oil, lemon juice, honey, garlic, salt, and pepper in a small jar. Gently fold shrimp and avocado into vegetables. Drizzle with dressing and toss.
notes: Store undressed salad for up to 3 days. Add ½ tsp red pepper flakes for spice!
